column1: Little Goat Diner////The staff at the host/hostess stand was a little snoody in my opinion
column2: but the waitress was excellent. Our party enjoyed nachos
column8: and finished it all off with some fresh spun milkshakes. High quality ingredients and the food came out ULTRA fast. Waitress was very quick and helpful with a slight food error and made sure to fully rectify the situation. Very happy we tried this one!
